summary: One of the best saves on skyrim! VERSION 1.0
descriptionHtml:
In this save it includes over 75 mods on it. The whole world is very real looking having only the best ENB/RealVision. Facial features and over 400 hairstyles for females and may be 25 or more for males. Blackthorn's newest update is also included in this save. Of course using ` typing "showracemenu" you can change everything on your Char. Also included are MANY new clothes and weapons to craft at a blacksmiths. Also included for most people that love to live on Skyrim like a real life this save is for you! The pregnant mod is included along with all Hearthfire mods to make your game more fun and realistic. As followers go the UFO is on the save so you can enjoy all of your followers. If you want to rule the world feel free to because the Become High King Of Skyrim mod is included so you can make all the rules! There are so many mods included. There are also a few wolf pets aswel so you can have an attack dog lol
You start off in a field with a redguard merc on your tail! The redguard Mercs are deadly and are hunting for you. Your best friend Erik The Slayer is in DANGER! you must be quick to save him. Beware my friend this modded world will test your skills to see if your great! If you are having trouble I would say go to Blackthorn and build the town how you want, hire guards and settle down and wait for trouble to find you. But if you want action and a challange just roam around you will get it.
author: elitegamer24
